text: Fever is a song by international pop singer/songwriter Lady Gaga. The song, however, was given to Adam Lambert to be released off the album For Your Entertainment for mainstream radio in New Zealand. The song hit #3 on the New Zealand Pop chart in September 2010. The song was released by Lambert on August 3rd, 2010. Category:Adam Lambert songs Category:2010 songs
title: Fever (Adam Lambert song)
